item.title: Join Us
item.dc:creator: Admin@Sapigo
item.content:encoded:
Detta är en exempelsida. Den skiljer sig från ett blogginlägg eftersom den är statisk och kommer att finnas på samma plats hela tiden, den kommer troligen att visas i din sidnavigering (i de flesta teman). De flesta börjar med en Om-sida som introducerar dem för potentiella besökare. Den skulle t.ex kunna ha följande innehåll:
Hej där! Jag är cykelbud på dagen, blivande skådespelare på natten och detta är min blogg. Jag bor i Örebro, har en katt som heter Lurv och jag gillar mitt morgonkaffe (och att simma i Göta kanal).
... eller något liknande detta:
Den officiella svenska portalen för WordPress, WordPress Sverige grundades 2007 och tillhandahåller svenska översättningar för WordPress, teman och tillägg. Behöver man hjälp med att komma igång eller stöter på problem så är WordPress Sverige den perfekta platsen att få svensk support på. Du hittar portalen på wpsv.se.
Som ny WordPress-användare bör du gå till din adminpanel för att ta bort denna sida och sedan skapa nya sidor för ditt innehåll. Ha det så kul!

item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: Admin@Sapigo
item.content:encoded:
[menu_anchor name="home"][fullwidth background_color="" background_image="" background_parallax="none" enable_mobile="no" parallax_speed="0.3" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="left top" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_webm="" video_mp4="" video_ogv="" video_preview_image="" overlay_color="" overlay_opacity="0.5" video_mute="yes" video_loop="yes" fade="no" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="solid" padding_top="2%" padding_bottom="40px" padding_left="" padding_right="" hundred_percent="no" equal_height_columns="no" hide_on_mobile="no" menu_anchor="" class="" id=""][one_full last="yes" spacing="yes" center_content="no" hide_on_mobile="no" background_color="" background_image="" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="left top" hover_type="none" link="" border_position="all" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="solid" padding="20px" margin_top="14px" margin_bottom="" animation_type="0" animation_direction="up" animation_speed="0.7" animation_offset="" class="" id=""][fusion_text]

Stability to Agility

[/fusion_text][/one_full][/fullwidth][menu_anchor name="vision"][fullwidth background_color="#f4f6f8" background_image="http://localhost:8080/sapigo/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/light_gradient_bands_bg.jpg" background_parallax="none" enable_mobile="no" parallax_speed="0.3" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="center center" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_webm="" video_mp4="" video_ogv="" video_preview_image="" overlay_color="" overlay_opacity="0.5" video_mute="yes" video_loop="yes" fade="no" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="solid" padding_top="1.5%" padding_bottom="2.5%" padding_left="" padding_right="" hundred_percent="no" equal_height_columns="no" hide_on_mobile="no" menu_anchor="" class="" id=""][fusion_text]

Vision

[/fusion_text][one_sixth last="no" spacing="yes" center_content="no" hide_on_mobile="no" background_color="" background_image="" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="left top" hover_type="none" link="" border_position="all" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="" padding="" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" class="" id=""][/one_sixth][two_third last="no" spacing="yes" center_content="no" hide_on_mobile="no" background_color="" background_image="" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="left top" hover_type="none" link="" border_position="all" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="solid" padding="" margin_top="65px" margin_bottom="" animation_type="0" animation_direction="down" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" class="" id=""][youtube id="o16iHNoOwrE" width="600" height="350" autoplay="no" api_params="" class=""][/youtube][fusion_text]

Do you wanna know why I use a knife? Guns are too quick. You can't savor all the... little emotions. You see, in their last moments, people show you who they really are. So in a way, I knew your friends better than you ever did. Would you like to know which of them were cowards? Never start with the head. The victim gets all fuzzy. He can't feel the next... See? If you're good at something, never do it for free. Now, our operation is small but there is a lot of potential for aggressive expansion. So which of you fine gentlemen would like to join our team? Oh. There's only one spot open right now, so we're gonna have... tryouts. It's simple. We, uh, kill the Batman.

[/fusion_text][/two_third][one_sixth last="yes" spacing="yes" center_content="no" hide_on_mobile="no" background_color="" background_image="" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="left top" hover_type="none" link="" border_position="all" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="" padding="" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" class="" id=""][/one_sixth][/fullwidth][menu_anchor name="services"][fullwidth background_color="#56709c" background_image="" background_parallax="none" enable_mobile="no" parallax_speed="0.3" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="center center" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_webm="" video_mp4="" video_ogv="" video_preview_image="" overlay_color="" overlay_opacity="0.5" video_mute="yes" video_loop="yes" fade="no" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="solid" padding_top="1.5%" padding_bottom="2.5%" padding_left="" padding_right="" hundred_percent="no" equal_height_columns="no" hide_on_mobile="no" menu_anchor="" class="" id=""][fusion_text]

Services

[/fusion_text][fusion_text]Our service offerings include advisory services, management consulting, project management and expert support in all phases of the digital business solution lifecycle. Whether the company is facing the introduction of SAP or has SAP introduced previously, we ensure that investment and its business value is in focus. By ensuring proper advisory services and decision support, the right digital business solution and right pre-requisites for an implementation we will help our customers achieve desired business value. Some examples of our offering is the development of strategy for digital business systems, consultancy and client support, requirement definition, project management, process development, design and management of IT operations. Our offerings connected to the phases of the digital business solution lifecycle:[/fusion_text][two_fifth last="no" spacing="yes" center_content="no" hide_on_mobile="no" background_color="" background_image="" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="left top" hover_type="none" link="" border_position="all" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="" padding="" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" class="" id=""][fusion_text]ERP Strategy[/fusion_text][imageframe lightbox="no" gallery_id="" lightbox_image="" style_type="none" hover_type="none" bordercolor="" bordersize="0px" borderradius="0" stylecolor="" align="none" link="" linktarget="_self" animation_type="0" animation_direction="down" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" hide_on_mobile="no" class="" id=""] [/imageframe][/two_fifth][three_fifth last="yes" spacing="yes" center_content="no" hide_on_mobile="no" background_color="" background_image="" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="left top" hover_type="none" link="" border_position="all" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="" padding="" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" class="" id=""][fusion_text]We act as advisors in the early phase when the framework for an investment is and alignment decisions for the business solution is taken. By understanding our customers' business needs and extensive experience of ERP strategy, we can help create the right conditions.
  • IT and ERP strategy and roadmap
  • Software selection and decision support
  • Development of Business Case
  • Value realization
  • Design and selection of application run and maintenance approach
[/fusion_text][/three_fifth][three_fifth last="no" spacing="yes" center_content="no" hide_on_mobile="no" background_color="" background_image="" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="left top" hover_type="none" link="" border_position="all" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="" padding="" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" class="" id=""][fusion_text]Explore and Evaluate[/fusion_text][imageframe lightbox="no" gallery_id="" lightbox_image="" style_type="none" hover_type="none" bordercolor="" bordersize="0px" borderradius="0" stylecolor="" align="none" link="" linktarget="_self" animation_type="0" animation_direction="down" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" hide_on_mobile="no" class="" id=""] [/imageframe][fusion_text]Before a decision on implementation, we help our customers create a better basis for decisions by exploring and evaluating business solutions by acting as advisor, project management or solution expert.
  • Project management and quality assurance
  • Implementation Strategy
  • Process analysis and design
  • Requirements gathering and definition
  • Solution selection
  • Advising and client support
[/fusion_text][/three_fifth][one_fourth last="yes" spacing="yes" center_content="no" hide_on_mobile="no" background_color="" background_image="" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="left top" hover_type="none" link="" border_position="all" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="" padding="" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" class="" id=""][fusion_text]Implementation[/fusion_text][imageframe lightbox="no" gallery_id="" lightbox_image="" style_type="none" hover_type="none" bordercolor="" bordersize="0px" borderradius="0" stylecolor="" align="none" link="" linktarget="_self" animation_type="0" animation_direction="down" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" hide_on_mobile="no" class="" id=""] [/imageframe][fusion_text]Sapigo assists with project management, change management and expertise in SAP business solutions to ensure that the correct drive and skills linked to the introduction.
  • Project management
  • Application Architecture
  • Process analysis and design
  • Test Management
  • Organizational Change Management
  • Preparation for Application Management
  • Quality assurance and independent quality audit
  • Project recovery
[/fusion_text][/one_fourth][one_fourth last="yes" spacing="yes" center_content="no" hide_on_mobile="no" background_color="" background_image="" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="left top" hover_type="none" link="" border_position="all" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="" padding="" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" class="" id=""][fusion_text]Process Improvement and Application Management Support[/fusion_text][imageframe lightbox="no" gallery_id="" lightbox_image="" style_type="none" hover_type="none" bordercolor="" bordersize="0px" borderradius="0" stylecolor="" align="none" link="" linktarget="_self" animation_type="0" animation_direction="down" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" hide_on_mobile="no" class="" id=""] [/imageframe][fusion_text]An implemented business solution is rarely complete and must be developed over time. In addition, operational changes set new demands on the business solution. We support our customers with expertise in developing business solution in line with changes in the business or new functionality in SAP solutions.
  • Process development and process improvement
  • Requirement definition
  • Application management
  • Release management
  • Competency development within Application management organization
[/fusion_text][/one_fourth][/fullwidth][menu_anchor name="customercases"][fullwidth background_color="" background_image="http://localhost:8080/sapigo/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/light_gradient_bands_bg.jpg" background_parallax="none" enable_mobile="no" parallax_speed="0.3" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="left top" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_webm="" video_mp4="" video_ogv="" video_preview_image="" overlay_color="" overlay_opacity="0.5" video_mute="yes" video_loop="yes" fade="no" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="solid" padding_top="5%" padding_bottom="6%" padding_left="" padding_right="" hundred_percent="no" equal_height_columns="no" hide_on_mobile="no" menu_anchor="" class="" id=""][fusion_text]

Customer Cases

[/fusion_text][separator style_type="none" top_margin="" bottom_margin="" sep_color="" border_size="" icon="" icon_circle="" icon_circle_color="" width="" alignment="" class="" id=""][content_boxes settings_lvl="parent" layout="icon-on-side" columns="3" icon_align="left" title_size="28px" title_color="" body_color="" backgroundcolor="" icon_circle="" icon_circle_radius="" iconcolor="" circlecolor="" circlebordercolor="" circlebordersize="" outercirclebordercolor="" outercirclebordersize="" icon_size="" icon_hover_type="" hover_accent_color="" link_type="" link_area="" link_target="" animation_delay="350" animation_offset="" animation_type="fade" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.7" margin_top="" margin_bottom="2%" class="" id=""][content_box title="Retail" icon="fa-shopping-cart" backgroundcolor="" iconcolor="" circlecolor="" circlebordercolor="" circlebordersize="" outercirclebordercolor="" outercirclebordersize="" iconrotate="" iconspin="no" image="" image_width="35" image_height="35" link="" linktext="" link_target="_self" animation_type="" animation_direction="" animation_speed=""]Leading player in the Retail industry. OBJECTIVES Strengthen the administrative organisations capability In conjunction with implementation of SAP. RESPONSIBILITIES
  • Solution Architect for finance and accounting solution
  • Develop the administrative organization, including external recruitment
  • Claims process support
  • Design, development and configuration of new requirements
  • Test management
RESULTS
  • Established more efficient management structure and processes
  • Delivered required process support functionality, including training
  • Reduced of necessary administration resources
[/content_box][content_box title="Sustainability" icon="fa-recycle" backgroundcolor="" iconcolor="" circlecolor="" circlebordercolor="" circlebordersize="" outercirclebordercolor="" outercirclebordersize="" iconrotate="" iconspin="no" image="" image_width="35" image_height="35" link="" linktext="" link_target="_self" animation_type="" animation_direction="" animation_speed=""]Global Telecom leader OBJECTIVES Introduction of Group-wide B2B solution in conjunction with a merger in the telecom industry RESPONSIBILITIES
  • Project management for the implementation of the SAP solution
  • Customer and Partner portal strategy definition
  • Application selection and procurement of new portal platform
  • Project management of mission-critical B2B solution
  • Quality assurance of the parallel projects
RESULTS
  • Created a new business model and system platform for the integration of acquired companies
  • Ensured delivery of project on time, cost and quality
[/content_box][content_box title="Mobile Solution" icon="fa-mobile" backgroundcolor="" iconcolor="" circlecolor="" circlebordercolor="" circlebordersize="" outercirclebordercolor="" outercirclebordersize="" iconrotate="" iconspin="no" image="" image_width="35" image_height="35" link="" linktext="" link_target="_self" animation_type="" animation_direction="" animation_speed=""]Project management and solution design for global roll-out of SAP in the manufacturing industry. OBJECTIVES To ensure cost-effective rollout of a corporate SAP solution for all markets, in order to enable efficient processes, effective group consolidation and global information sharing. The project applied a group-wide SAP "template", which was implemented throughout the business. RESPONSIBILITIES
  • Advising on the establishment of a global roll-out strategy
  • Planning, estimation and resource hedging program plan for global roll-out
  • Project feasibility studies as well as roll-out projects
  • The management of international projects with local partners in China, Japan and South America.
  • In an entrepreneurial way, run the project with the right means to achieve its goals
RESULTS
  • Enabled access to a global source of information within the company
  • Enabled efficient utilization of central IS infrastructure to minimize the Group's IS / IT expenses
  • Ensured the delivery according to established cost and time frames
[/content_box][/content_boxes][/fullwidth][menu_anchor name="joinus"][fullwidth background_color="#ffffff" background_image="" background_parallax="none" enable_mobile="no" parallax_speed="0.3" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="left top" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_webm="" video_mp4="" video_ogv="" video_preview_image="" overlay_color="" overlay_opacity="0.5" video_mute="yes" video_loop="yes" fade="no" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="solid" padding_top="25px" padding_bottom="25px" padding_left="" padding_right="" hundred_percent="no" equal_height_columns="no" hide_on_mobile="no" menu_anchor="" class="" id=""][fusion_text]

Join Us

[/fusion_text][fusion_text]

Sapigo is looking for jolly people to join our sublime team!

[/fusion_text][separator style_type="none" top_margin="" bottom_margin="" sep_color="" border_size="" icon="" icon_circle="" icon_circle_color="" width="" alignment="" class="" id=""][one_third last="no" spacing="no" center_content="no" hide_on_mobile="no" background_color="#ffffff" background_image="" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="left top" hover_type="none" link="" item.title: Sapigo is back!
item.dc:creator: Admin@Sapigo
item.content:encoded: Välkommen till Sapigo! Nu är vi igång igen! :)

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hej, Det här är en kommentar. För att komma igång med moderering, redigering och radering av kommentarer, besök sidan för kommentarer i adminpanelen. Kommentarsförfattares visningsbilder kommer från Gravatar.
